member.name: T:Syncfusion.Core.XForms.IPullToRefresh
member.summary: Defines methods and properties that must be implemented to get notification of the pull to refresh actions.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Core.XForms.IPullToRefresh.Pulling(System.Double,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Provides notifications regarding the pulling action with the progress value and an out parameter to cancel the pulling event.
member.param: progress value of the pulling action.
If cancel is set to true, pulling will be cancelled

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Core.XForms.IPullToRefresh.Refreshing
member.summary: Provides notifications regarding the refreshing action.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Core.XForms.IPullToRefresh.Refreshed
member.summary: Signals that the view refreshing is completed.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Core.XForms.IPullToRefresh.PullingCancelled
member.summary: Signals that the pulling action is cancelled before the progress meeting 100.
